content: these socks were designed as a prize for additional category hence surprise of sock challenge cup contest one sock is worked cuff-down while the other is toe-up both have patterned arc-expansion area with modified square heel turn and toe in pattern **techniques used ** * magic loop * following charts * twisted-stitch knitting * invisible circular beginning 1 detailed instructions are **not included** * modified interlock bind-off 2 * shadow wraps * lifted increases * judy s magic cast-on grafting optional *semki* means sunflower seeds in russian and was contributed by oksana 3 - - - **updates** *note 31-oct-2017 pattern update 1 06 available on cuff-down sock it should be 39 stitches on needle 1 after rearrangement for the heel turn thanks to tricoteka /people/tricoteka * *31 10 2017 выпущена версия 1 06 в носке от манжеты 3 вместе изн заменяются изнаночной перед схемой верхней половины стопы и мыска а не после спасибо tricoteka /people/tricoteka * *note 07-oct-2017 pattern update 1 05 available on cuff-down sock after round 92 of arc-expansion it should be 128 sts not 124 thanks to spindleknitter /people/spindleknitter and also to liliwinter /people/liliwinter for reminder also improved some wording * *07 10 2017 выпущена версия 1 05 в носке от манжеты после 92 ряда зоны подъема стопы должно быть 128 петель а не 124 спасибо spindleknitter /people/spindleknitter а также liliwinter /people/liliwinter за напоминание также уточнены некоторые формулировки * *note 15-decrease-2014 pattern update 1 04 available corrected toe-up arc chart thanks to locaknits /people/locaknits * *15 12 2014 выпущена версия 1 04 исправлена схема зоны подъема стопы для носков от мыска спасибо locaknits /people/locaknits * *note 28-jun-2014 pattern update 1 03 available corrected cuff-down arc chart and cuff-down instep&toe chart thanks to havtwoknit /people/havtwoknit * *28 06 2014 выпущена версия 1 03 исправлены схемы зоны подъема стопы а также верхней половины стопы и мыска для носков от манжеты спасибо havtwoknit /people/havtwoknit * *note 03-oct-2013 pattern update 1 02 available instructions for foot section of toe-up sock should be read as follows * work sole in stockinette and instep in pattern as established to the end of *round 69 * *03 10 2013 выпущена русская версия 1 02 * thank you to my thoroughful test knitters oksana 4 natalia 5 revi 6 thank you to revi 7 for charts and help with tech editinig thank you to oksana 8 for illustrations thank you to anna 9 for photos 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/skeincharmer/mk-invisible-circular-beginning 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/skeincharmer/mk-modified-interlock-bind-off 3 http //www ravelry com/people/romashkoo 4 http //www ravelry
